prototypes.prototype: Object_Address.Choice.List.Delete( position as N, count as N )

argument.name: Object_Address
argument.description: The address of a list or combo box on a form.

argument.name: position
argument.description: The number of the first element to delete.

argument.name: count
argument.description: The number of elements to delete.

page.discussion: The <ARRAY>.DELETE() method deletes Count entries in a single dimensional array starting at Position. "Empty" entries in the array are closed up. Contrast this with <ARRAY>.CLEAR() which does not close up empty entries.
